---
title: "References"
title-block-banner: "images/hero.jpg"
title-block-banner-alt: "Taylor Swift on stage with a microphone in hand, likely during a concert. The individual is facing towards the right, with their head turned to look at the camera, giving a confident smile. They are wearing a glittering bodysuit adorned with sequins in shades of gold and blue, paired with fishnet stockings and sparkling knee-high boots. At the top of the image, in large white text against a black background, reads TAYLOR'S TOWERING YEAR. Below the main image, a bar of smaller images or possibly a visual data representation features the text ERAS TOUR TOLD BY DATA with some letters clear and others obscured by heart symbols replacing the Os."
format: html
---


## Acknowledgements

Thank you to [Ben Ruijl](https://github.com/benruijl) for the `progress_bar.html` code.

## References

### Introduction

"Seven months since the first show in Glendale, Arizona, her Eras Tour has done a projected \$2 billion in ticket sales and generated an additional \$6.3 billion in direct consumer spending."[^1]

[^1]: QuestionPro Survey

index.qmd@gdp-comparison-plot, "more in line with the yearly GDP of small nations than a music tour."[^2]

[^2]: "List_of_countries_by_GDP_(nominal)." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia, Wikimedia Foundation, 31 October 2023, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_GDP_(nominal).

### Setting the stage

index.qmd@fig-taylor-economic-impact-map[^3]

[^3]: See list of sources here: https://github.com/posit-marketing/taylor-swift-tour/blob/main/data/taylor-economic-impact.csv

2018 Reputation Tour had 3 million attendees and did only $440 million gross[^4]

[^4]: "List of Taylor Swift live performances." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia, Wikimedia Foundation, 31 October 2023, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Taylor_Swift_live_performances.

### In the limelight

index.qmd@tswift-v-others-sankey, top-gross-decades plots [^5]

[^5]: "List of highest-grossing concert tours." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia, Wikimedia Foundation, 31 October 2023, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_highest-grossing_concert_tours.

Eras is projected to do over $2B[^6]

[^6]: Hur, Krystal. "First on CNN: Taylor Swiftâ€™s Eras tour could become the highest grossing tour of all time." CNN Business, 17 August 2023, https://www.cnn.com/2023/08/17/business/taylor-swift-eras-tour-two-billion/index.html.

### Opening acts

Spotify and YouTube subscription numbers[^7]

[^7]: SongStats API, https://docs.songstats.com/
